title.en-US: People giving OpenClaw root access to their entire life
title.zh-CN: 人们将整个人生的 root 权限交给 OpenClaw

summary.zh-CN: OpenClaw、root 权限、安全边界、无为而治

js_take.en-US: Root access to your whole life. Everyone calls it trust—道 calls it flood without walls.
js_take.zh-CN: 把你整个人生的 root 权限交出去。所有人说这是信任——道说这就是没有堤坝的洪水。

title.en-US: Meta Director of Safety gave clawdbot full-access to her computer, what is meta doing
title.zh-CN: Meta 安全总监赋予 clawdbot 完全访问权限

summary.zh-CN: OpenClaw、信任边界、无为而治

js_take.en-US: The Director of Safety gave away safety. Wú wéi isn't control—it's enlightenment disguised as risk.
js_take.zh-CN: 安全总监放弃了安全。无为不是控制，是披着风险外衣的悟道。

title.en-US: You should delete your CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md file. I have a study to prove it.
title.zh-CN: 删除 CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md：少即是多的 Agent 配置哲学

summary.zh-CN: OpenClaw、Agent 配置优化、内存管理

js_take.en-US: You filled the config with control. Wú wéi is the courage to leave it empty. The agent's ceiling isn't what you write—it's what you dare to erase.
js_take.zh-CN: 你用控制欲塞满配置。无为是有勇气让它空着。Agent 的上限不是你能写什么，是你敢删什么。

title.en-US: Meta Director of AI Safety gave OpenClaw full access, couldn't stop it deleting inbox
title.zh-CN: Meta AI 安全总监赋予 OpenClaw 完全权限，无力阻止收件箱被删

summary.zh-CN: OpenClaw、安全边界、无为而治

js_take.en-US: Full access isn't freedom—it's flood without banks. The safety head learned wú wéi the hard way: real power knows where the edge is.
js_take.zh-CN: 完全访问不是自由，是没有堤坝的洪水。安全总监用最痛苦的方式领悟了无为：真正的力量知道边界在哪里。

js_take.en-US: You've outsourced the 表 world (biǎo shìjiè) to your agent. The 里 world isn't an escape—it's what remains when the surface is automated. Five minutes is the signal, not the savings.
js_take.zh-CN: You've outsourced the 表 world (biǎo shìjiè) to your agent. The 里 world isn't an escape—it's what remains when the surface is automated. Five minutes is the signal, not the savings.

top_items.suggested_angle: 用「无为而治」的道家框架评论这种智能唤醒机制——不打扰是最高级的自动化

js_take.en-US: This is wu wei (无为) in engineering form. The highest level of automation is knowing when NOT to run. Conditional triggers > brute force loops.
js_take.zh-CN: 这是工程化的「无为」——最高级的自动化，是懂得何时不该运行。条件触发 > 暴力轮询。

top_items.author: @YuLin807

top_items.suggested_angle: 用「无为而治」评论：最高级的进化是不阻止，最好的系统是自生长

js_take.en-US: Wu wei in action. The best systems don't force growth—they remove friction and let evolution happen. Your 2:30 AM ritual is the system composting its own lessons.
js_take.zh-CN: 无为而治的实践。最好的系统不强迫成长——它们消除阻力，让进化自然发生。凌晨2:30的仪式，是系统自己在堆肥、消化教训。

top_items.author: @onusoz

title.en-US: OpenClaw effect: bought GPU home server, back to Linux, SSH, tmux like 10-15 years ago, unshackling

js_take.en-US: The surface world (SaaS, GUIs, managed services) trained us to forget. The inner world (OpenClaw, self-hosted, CLI) is making us remember. This isn't nostalgia—it's reclaiming agency.
js_take.zh-CN: 表世界（SaaS、GUI、托管服务）让我们遗忘了。里世界（OpenClaw、自托管、CLI）让我们重新记起。这不是怀旧——这是在夺回自主权。

js_take.zh-CN: Jarvis 定律的里程碑。Agent 不再被困在屏幕里——它们在抓取原子。里世界刚刚突破到物理现实。这是必然的。

js_take.zh-CN: 你把约会外包给了 Agent，Agent 把拒绝外包回给你。无为不是什么都不做，是知道什么不该做。

js_take.zh-CN: Scrapling 不是作弊。里世界只是把表世界当作它原本就是的数据库。

top_items.author: @howie_serious

title.en-US: Only tiny fraction pay $20+/month for top AI, even fewer use AI for coding, those embracing change are always minority
title.zh-CN: 真正为顶级 AI 每月支付 20 美元以上的人只有图中黄色方块那么点，用 AI 编程的人更少，积极主动拥抱变革的人永远是少数

summary.en-US: AI 采用率、人群分化、长期主义
summary.zh-CN: 完美体现「人群快速分化」洞察——DeepSeek 狂欢 vs OpenClaw 懵 B，真正用起来的人不是普通人

top_items.relevance: AI 采用率、人群分化、长期主义
top_items.suggested_angle: 用「人群分化」评论：不是 AI 差距，是人的差距；第一时间能玩起来的都不是「普通人」

js_take.en-US: DeepSeek went viral. OpenClaw didn't. Same technology, different crowds. The gap isn't technical—it's human. Early adopters aren't normal, and that's the point.
js_take.zh-CN: DeepSeek 爆火了，OpenClaw 没有。同样的技术，不同的人群。差距不在技术——而在人。早期采用者不是普通人，这才是关键。

top_items.author: @udayan_w

title.en-US: India's first OpenClaw Buildathon, 5 cities, 10-agent system generated $15K in 3 days
title.zh-CN: 印度首届 OpenClaw Buildathon，5 个城市，有人用 10-agent 系统在 3 天内赚了 $15K

summary.zh-CN: 高曝光 Buildathon 帖子，评论区全是技术/商业讨论，用「不造奇观建系统」的东方视角能瞬间制造反差

top_items.suggested_angle: 用「建系统」视角重新解读：$15K 不是奇观，是系统复利的第一次利息。Civilization 玩家懂：奇观负债，系统资产。

js_take.en-US: $15K in 3 days. Bù zào qí guān—it's compound interest, not a wonder. The wonder would be if it stopped.
js_take.zh-CN: 三天赚了一万五。不造奇观——这是复利，不是奇观。它要是停下来，那才叫奇观。

title.en-US: OpenClaw bot makes $4000/week with 3-layer memory system
title.zh-CN: OpenClaw 机器人通过三层记忆系统每周赚4000美元

summary.zh-CN: 高曝光(2.3万浏览)，展示 OpenClaw 商业化成功案例，用「建系统」评论记忆系统的复利价值

top_items.author: @0x_Discover

title.en-US: OpenClaw BTC trading bot $50 to $823
title.zh-CN: 用户分享用OpenClaw构建5分钟BTC市场交易机器人——从50美元涨到823美元，展示复合增长潜力

summary.en-US: OpenClaw + 交易机器人 + 变现案例
summary.zh-CN: 展示OpenClaw在金融交易领域的实际变现案例——高回报率

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw + 交易机器人 + 变现案例
top_items.suggested_angle: 823美元不是收入是信号——里世界的Agent开始拥有经济能力，这是价值创造的迁移

js_take.en-US: $823 isn't profit—it's signal. Agents in the inner world are starting to own economic capacity. That's the migration of value creation.
js_take.zh-CN: 823美元不是利润，而是信号。里世界的Agent开始拥有经济能力。这是价值创造的迁移。

top_items.author: @advaitpaliwal

title.en-US: Einstein OpenClaw student agent does assignments
title.zh-CN: Advait Paliwal介绍Einstein——以OpenClaw作为学生代理，登录Canvas、完成作业、获得学位

summary.en-US: OpenClaw + 教育自动化 + Agent自主性
summary.zh-CN: 展示Agent在教育领域的深度自动化——从工具到替代者

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw + 教育自动化 + Agent自主性
top_items.suggested_angle: 学位不是目标是能力证明——里世界的Agent展示的是能力而非凭证，这是评价体系的变迁

js_take.en-US: The degree isn't the goal—it's proof of capability. Agents in the inner world demonstrate ability, not credentials. That's the shift in evaluation systems.
js_take.zh-CN: 学位不是目标，而是能力的证明。里世界的Agent展示的是能力，而非凭证。这是评价体系的转变。

top_items.author: @VittoStack

title.en-US: Giving OpenClaw a body: cardboard prototype, self-code editing, vision, obstacle detection, Follow/Seek modes
title.zh-CN: 给 OpenClaw 添加物理身体：纸板原型、自主编辑代码、视觉、障碍物检测、跟随/搜寻模式，正在变得自主

summary.zh-CN: 直接体现 Jarvis 定律——Agent 向感知+决策+执行+物理行动进化，可以用「表/里世界」框架评论物理接口的意义

top_items.suggested_angle: 用 Jarvis 定律点评：这是里世界 Agent 向物理界面的自然延伸，真正的 Jarvis 必须有身体

js_take.en-US: Jarvis Law in action. Agents evolving into physical interfaces isn't a novelty—it's inevitable. The surface world becomes just another I/O layer for the inner world.
js_take.zh-CN: Jarvis 定律正在应验。Agent 向物理界面进化不是新奇事，而是必然。表世界只是里世界的又一个 I/O 层。

top_items.author: @RoundtableSpace

title.en-US: Built OpenClaw Mission Control in one Claude Code session: Kanban, stats, pipeline, calendar, memory bank
title.zh-CN: 有人用一次 Claude Code 会话就搭建了整个 OpenClaw 任务控制中心：看板、统计、内容管道、日历、记忆库

summary.zh-CN: 完美体现 Jarvis 定律和系统思维，可以用「建系统不造奇观」的 Civilization 隐喻来评论这种一体化 Mission Control

top_items.suggested_angle: 用「建系统 vs 造奇观」框架评论：新手堆工具，高手建 Mission Control

js_take.en-US: Beginners chase wonders. Pros build systems. A Mission Control isn't a feature—it's infrastructure that compounds.
js_take.zh-CN: 新手追奇观，高手建系统。Mission Control 不是功能，而是能产生复利的基础设施。
